short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy-to-use and lite Magic Squares game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Magic Squares is a fun, and brainstorming game for your browser.

Start the game by pressing on the arrow keys on your keyboard. Alternatively, you can use touch gestures if you have a touch-enabled device. The goal in this game is to put the numbers in order so that they read from 1 to 8. The 0 is the "empty" cell. Click on any number next to 0 (top, right, bottom, or left) to switch places. Pressing on the new game will reset tiles with new random orderings. 

If you have a feature request or found a bug to report, please fill the bug report form in the add-on's homepage: https://mybrowseraddon.com/magic-squares.html
